imdb.title: Karin
imdb.plot: In the 21st century, a family of vampires settled down on the grounds of Japan and lived a modest life whilst sucking on the blood of humans discreetly. However, the eldest daughter of the family, Karin Maaka, has an embarassing s...

episodes.title: Afurechatte hazukashii
episodes.plot: Meet Karin Maaka. Though she appears to be a normal high school girl, there is a secret about her life that she MUST keep: she's from a family of vampires.

episodes.title: Atashi no konomi wa hazukashii
episodes.plot: Karin begs Kenta to keep her nosebleeds a secret. He does so, even cleaning up her mess. Karin is left perplexed as to why her blood increases faster around him.

episodes.title: Shiawasette hazukashii
episodes.plot: Karin continues her mission to lessen Kenta's misery, making him lunches for school.

episodes.title: Barechatte hazukashii
episodes.plot: Kenta is suspicious of Karin still.

episodes.title: Kazoku sorotte hazukashii
episodes.plot: Ren attempts to wipe Kenta's memory, but is stopped by Anju.

episodes.title: Kâ san genki de hazukashii
episodes.plot: Due to Karin's blood still having an effect on her, Fumio is constantly positive; however, after numerous failed attempts to get a job, the effects of the blood fade and Fumio goes back to being depressed.

episodes.title: Okkakerarete hazukashii
episodes.plot: Vampire hunter Winner Sinclair transfers to Karin's school.

episodes.title: Mitsukacchatte hazukashii
episodes.plot: Karin has a nosebleed at school, forcing her and Kenta to hide. Because they disappeared and the puddle of blood, Winner assumes a vampire has sent a servant to take blood from them.

episodes.title: Furikaeruto... hazukashii
episodes.plot: Anju becomes more involved with helping Karin with her relationship with Kenta.

episodes.title: Papa wa tottemo hazukashii
episodes.plot: Due to the recent mayhem since Kenta and Winner arrived, Karin was not able to focus on her school work; as a result she fails a test.

episodes.title: Atsu da! Pûru da! hazukashii
episodes.plot: Winner gives Karin a ticket to a resort, hoping to win her heart on a date.

episodes.title: Yappari aniki wa hazukashii
episodes.plot: Much to Karin's shock, Ren is targeting Fumio as a potential victim, due to the stress her unhappiness causes; Karin plans to bite her again to repel Ren (whom she fears will do more than just bite Fumio).

episodes.title: Mezamechatte hazukashii
episodes.plot: Karin is snapped out of feral state by Kenta saying her name and has a nosebleed.

episodes.title: Futari de asa made hazukashii
episodes.plot: With summer about to end, Karin realizes she didn't do her summer homework.

episodes.title: Eruda tôjô! De hazukashii
episodes.plot: Karin's grandmother, Elda Marker, awakens from a 16 year slumber; to her shock, Karin learns she is mirror image of Elda.

episodes.title: Eruda no koibana wa hazukashii
episodes.plot: Elda attempts to bite Kenta, but is stopped by Anju, who advises her to leave.

episodes.title: Saraba eruda de hazukashii
episodes.plot: The school festival is in full swing.

episodes.title: Aniki no himitsu wa hazukashii
episodes.plot: Boogie reveals a secret from Ren's past to Anju and Karin.

episodes.title: Futari no ibu wa hazukashii
episodes.plot: It's Christmas time. Maki convinces Karin to get a gift for Kenta and confess her love (as she plans to do the same with Winner).

episodes.title: Hajimete no... hazukashii
episodes.plot: Anju has a dream of biting Karin, scaring her. Karin is also quitting her part-time job; Kenta also managed to ask her out.

episodes.title: Dôsureba iinoka hazukashii
episodes.plot: The Maaka family has received Elda's news and await her return.

episodes.title: Mayoigo mitai ni hazukashii
episodes.plot: Elda manages to give Victor the slip and get back home.

episodes.title: Sayonara wa hazukashii
episodes.plot: Karin returns home, finding her parents crying that she's safe. Anju questions why Karin came back, knowing how much Karin and Kenta love each other.

episodes.title: Itsumo futari wa hazukashii
episodes.plot: The ceremony to turn Karin into a proper vampire begins; however, she doubts that this is the right choice.
